targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  School_Serial_Id AS "time",
  School_Location
FROM school_monitor_system.edge_list
WHERE
  concat('school_', school_Id) = '$DataBase_Name'
ORDER BY School_Serial_Id

SELECT
  School_Serial_Id AS "time",
  School_Name
FROM school_monitor_system.edge_list
WHERE
  concat('school_', school_Id) = '$DataBase_Name'
ORDER BY School_Serial_Id

SELECT
  School_LastCheck AS "time",
  concat(upper(LEFT(School_Status,1)), SUBSTRING(School_Status, 2, length(School_Status)-1))
FROM school_monitor_system.edge_regist
WHERE
  concat('school_', school_Id) = '$DataBase_Name'
ORDER BY School_LastCheck

SELECT
  School_LastCheck AS "time",
  upper(School_MAC)
FROM school_monitor_system.edge_regist
WHERE
  concat('school_', school_Id) = '$DataBase_Name'
ORDER BY School_LastCheck

panels.title: 學校端 Librenms 樹莓派 MAC

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  School_LastCheck AS "time",
  School_IP
FROM school_monitor_system.edge_regist
WHERE
  concat('school_', school_Id) = '$DataBase_Name'
ORDER BY School_LastCheck

SELECT
  School_LastCheck AS "time",
  concat(LEFT(School_LastCheck, 10), '\n', SUBSTRING(School_LastCheck, 11))
FROM school_monitor_system.edge_regist
WHERE
  concat('school_', school_Id) = '$DataBase_Name'
ORDER BY School_LastCheck

panels.title: 學校端 最後更新狀態時間

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_logged AS "time",
  ping
FROM $DataBase_Name.speedtest
ORDER BY id
desc
limit 1

SELECT
  time_logged AS "time",
  download
FROM $DataBase_Name.speedtest
ORDER BY id
desc
limit 1

SELECT
  time_logged AS "time",
  upload
FROM $DataBase_Name.speedtest
ORDER BY id
desc
limit 1

SELECT
  time_logged AS "time",
  server_name
FROM $DataBase_Name.speedtest
ORDER BY id
desc
limit 1

SELECT
  time_logged AS "time",
  server_sponsor
FROM $DataBase_Name.speedtest
ORDER BY id
desc
limit 1

SELECT
  time_logged AS "time",
  server_distance
FROM $DataBase_Name.speedtest
ORDER BY id
desc
limit 1

SELECT
  concat(LEFT(time_logged, 10), '\n', SUBSTRING(time_logged, 11))
FROM $DataBase_Name.speedtest
ORDER BY id
desc
limit 1

SELECT
  time_logged AS "time",
  end_time-start_time
FROM $DataBase_Name.speedtest
ORDER BY id
desc
limit 1

SELECT
  DATE_SUB(time_logged, INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AS "time",
  ping
FROM $DataBase_Name.speedtest
ORDER BY id

SELECT
  DATE_SUB(time_logged, INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AS "time",
  download AS "下載"
FROM $DataBase_Name.speedtest
ORDER BY id

SELECT
  DATE_SUB(time_logged, INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AS "time",
  upload AS "上傳"
FROM $DataBase_Name.speedtest
ORDER BY id

SELECT
  DATE_SUB(time_logged, INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AS "time",
  end_time-start_time
FROM $DataBase_Name.speedtest
ORDER BY id

SELECT
  agent_uptime AS "time",
  hostname
FROM $DataBase_Name.devices
WHERE
  $DataBase_Name.devices.sysName = '$Devices'
ORDER BY agent_uptime

SELECT
  agent_uptime AS "time",
  concat(upper(LEFT(os,1)), SUBSTRING(os, 2, length(os)))
FROM $DataBase_Name.devices
WHERE
  $DataBase_Name.devices.sysName = '$Devices'
ORDER BY agent_uptime

SELECT
  agent_uptime AS "time",
  sysName
FROM $DataBase_Name.devices
WHERE
  $DataBase_Name.devices.sysName = '$Devices'
ORDER BY agent_uptime

SELECT
  agent_uptime AS "time",
  concat(upper(LEFT(type,1)), SUBSTRING(type, 2, length(type)-1))
FROM $DataBase_Name.devices
WHERE
  $DataBase_Name.devices.sysName = '$Devices'
ORDER BY agent_uptime

SELECT
  agent_uptime AS "time",
  status
FROM $DataBase_Name.devices
WHERE
  $DataBase_Name.devices.sysName = '$Devices'
ORDER BY agent_uptime

SELECT
  agent_uptime AS "time",
  sysDescr
FROM $DataBase_Name.devices
WHERE
  $DataBase_Name.devices.sysName = '$Devices'
ORDER BY agent_uptime

SELECT a.hostname AS "設備網管IP",
       concat(upper(LEFT(a.os,1)), SUBSTRING(a.os, 2, length(a.os))) AS "設備廠商",
       a.sysName AS "設備名稱",
       if (a.status=1, "開機中", "關機") AS "設備狀態",
       b.timestamp AS "最後更新時間",
       b.max AS "最大負載",
       b.min AS "最小負載",
       b.avg AS "平均負載"
FROM $DataBase_Name.devices a, $DataBase_Name.device_perf b
WHERE a.device_id = b.device_id
ORDER BY b.timestamp desc limit $Device_Count

panels.title: 學校設備總列表(測試用)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT b.sysName,
       a.details, 
       a.state,
       a.time_logged as "alert_time"
FROM $DataBase_Name.alert_log a, $DataBase_Name.devices b
WHERE a.device_id = b.device_id
ORDER BY alert_time desc

SELECT
  a.timestamp AS "time",
  a.max,
  a.min,
  a.avg
FROM $DataBase_Name.device_perf a, $DataBase_Name.devices b
WHERE
  a.device_id = b.device_id AND
  b.sysName = '$Devices'
ORDER BY a.timestamp

SELECT
  DATE_SUB(a.timestamp, INTERVAL 8 HOUR) AS "time",
  a.max,
  a.min,
  a.avg
FROM $DataBase_Name.device_perf a, $DataBase_Name.devices b
WHERE
  a.device_id = b.device_id AND
  b.sysName = '$Devices'
ORDER BY a.timestamp

SELECT
  DATE_SUB(a.time_logged, INTERVAL 8 hour) AS "time_sec",
  a.status
FROM $DataBase_Name.device_state_history a, $DataBase_Name.devices b
where a.device_id = b.device_id and b.sysName = '$Devices'
ORDER BY a.time_logged

SELECT
  time_logged AS "最後更新時間",
  if(a.status = 1, "開機中", "關機") AS "目前狀態"
FROM $DataBase_Name.device_state_history a, $DataBase_Name.devices b
where a.device_id = b.device_id and b.sysName = '$Devices'
group by id desc limit 20

SELECT
  agent_uptime AS "time",
  hostname
FROM $DataBase_Name.devices
WHERE
  $DataBase_Name.devices.sysName = '$Devices'
ORDER BY agent_uptime

SELECT
  time_logged AS "time",
  input AS "流入",
  output AS "流出"
FROM $DataBase_Name.ports
WHERE
  port_name = '$Device_Ports' AND
  hostname = '$Device_Hostname'
ORDER BY time_logged

SELECT
  time_logged AS "time",
  IF(port_status="up", 1, 0) as "狀態",
  input AS "流入",
  input AS "流出"
FROM $DataBase_Name.ports
WHERE port_name = '$Device_Ports' and hostname = '$Device_Hostname'
ORDER BY time_logged

SELECT
  time_logged AS "time",
  port_name
FROM $DataBase_Name.ports
WHERE
  port_name = '$Device_Ports' and hostname = '$Device_Hostname'
ORDER BY time_logged desc
limit 1

SELECT
  time_logged AS "time",
  port_speed
FROM $DataBase_Name.ports
WHERE
  port_name = '$Device_Ports'
ORDER BY time_logged

panels.title: 網路設備埠口硬體速度

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_logged AS "time",
  IF(port_status="up", 1, 0) as "執行狀態"
FROM $DataBase_Name.ports
WHERE port_name = '$Device_Ports' and hostname = '$Device_Hostname'
ORDER BY time_logged

panels.title: 網路設備埠口連接狀態

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_logged AS "time",
  IF(port_status="up", 1, 0)
FROM $DataBase_Name.ports
WHERE port_name = '$Device_Ports'
ORDER BY time_logged

panels.title: 網路設備埠口連接狀態

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  distinct(port_name) AS "埠口名稱",
  input AS "流入",
  time_logged AS "time"
FROM $DataBase_Name.ports
WHERE hostname = '$Device_Hostname'

panels.title: 網路設備埠口流量總覽

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  distinct(port_name) AS "埠口名稱",
  IF(port_status="up", 1, 0) as "狀態",
  DATE_ADD(time_logged, Interval 8 hour) AS "最後檢查時間"
FROM $DataBase_Name.ports
WHERE hostname = '$Device_Hostname'
limit $Device_Ports_Count

panels.title: 網路設備埠口流量總覽

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  distinct(port_name) AS "埠口名稱",
  output AS "流出",
  time_logged AS "time"
FROM $DataBase_Name.ports
WHERE hostname = '$Device_Hostname'

panels.title: 網路設備埠口流量總覽

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  distinct(port_name) AS "埠口名稱",
  input AS "流入",
  output AS "流出",
  time_logged AS "time"
FROM $DataBase_Name.ports
WHERE hostname = '$Device_Hostname' and (output > 0 or input > 0)

panels.title: 已連接設備的網路設備埠口流量總覽

list.definition: SELECT school_Name FROM information_schema.schemata, school_monitor_system.edge_list where schema_name like 'school_______' and schema_name = concat('school_', school_Id);
list.name: DataBases
list.query: SELECT school_Name FROM information_schema.schemata, school_monitor_system.edge_list where schema_name like 'school_______' and schema_name = concat('school_', school_Id);

list.definition: select concat('school_', school_Id) from school_monitor_system.edge_list where school_Name = '$DataBases';
list.name: DataBase_Name
list.query: select concat('school_', school_Id) from school_monitor_system.edge_list where school_Name = '$DataBases';
